info.title: TON API
info.description: API for interacting with The Open Network (TON) blockchain

get.description: Retrieves a list of messages from the TON blockchain

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of messages to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of messages to skip before starting to return results

source.description: The source address of the message

destination.description: The destination address of the message

value.description: The value transferred in the message

fwd_fee.description: The forward fee for the message

ihr_fee.description: The IHR (Instant Hypercube Routing) fee for the message

created_lt.description: The logical creation time of the message

body_hash.description: The hash of the message body
